ygData.subject: RE: level hell
ygData.msgSnippet: If it makes you feel any better i ve died 3 times in lev 30 and have been in it for over 3 weeks now, going on my 4th week. Its so depressing, this whole level
ygData.messageBody:
If it makes you feel any better i've died 3 times in lev 30 and have been in
it for over 3 weeks now, going on my 4th week. Its so depressing, this whole
level i've made enough money to buy full steel plate by killing giants, even
got a box of aku-bar. While i had almost caught up to most of my group when
i hit 30, they've all jumped ahead and are now all 37-40. If im lucky i
might level tonight or tomorrow and get out of my first hell level. I even
made a few low lev chars to change my train of thoughts to get away from the
depressing feeling of 30.

Minkin Nehoc
Forever 30
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Abraham Hardjana [SMTP:ahardjan@...]
> Sent: September 3, 1999 12:05 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Superstitions?
>
> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
>
>
> On Fri, 3 Sep 1999 kim@... wrote:
>
> > From: <kim@...>
> >
> > 25 is a mini-hell. Most people don't notice it, but I'd
> > estimate it took me about 70% longer to get through it.
>
>
>
> Ack say it isn't so =(. I dinna want it to be so. THough I think it is
> noticable in Unrest since the mobs are mostly blue to me now. Perhaps 25
> is one of those inbetween levels where most things are green or even =(.
> Time to check Mistmoore then.
>
> > At 31 you lose about a bubble per death (vs. about 1/4-1/3 at
> > 30 and 32). If you tend to have a high number of deaths per
> > level as I know many of you do, this can really screw you up.
> > Whereas before you were taking 5 steps forward and 2 steps
> > back for a net gain of 3 steps a night, at 31 this can turn
> > into 5 steps forward and 6 steps back for a net loss of 1 step
> > a night, even though you are gaining experience and dying at
> > the exact same rate as before. I hear this holds true for all
> > hell-levels + 1.
>
> Ack, now I am getting depressed my friend. I was so happy to have cleared
> leel 24 with only one death. As my friends know well I am way to big on
> the honour and chivalry bit and hence forth I die way too often
> helping/saving friends. Oh well I guess I will be one of those bards who
> will congratulated 20-30 times for getting my level 30 =). Anyone know a
> pretty cleric who would be willing to marry a bard who is proone to dying
> and causing trains? ... ANy takers?... I guess not =)
>
> Treilanin Loreweaver
> Honour Guard, Karana
>
>
>
